attributes.action: Publicise a full symptom list for long term recovery from "mid range" Covid 19.
attributes.additional_details: Tens of thousands of UK sufferers are experiencing  this “mid range” version of Coronavirus -- not just "a cough, mild fever , diarrhoea or loss of sense taste and smell" , but not as serious as being on a ventilator - this must be addressed, GP's must be instructed to treat this as a serious (possibly long term) condition and the Government guidance on Coronavirus should be updated to include all symptoms, recovery issues and advice on treatment.
attributes.background: The Government is not publicising that "mid range" Covid 19 sufferers experience a variety of over 20 symptoms and recovery relapses that vary in duration, severity and combination for up to 4 months from initial infection - possibly longer?.
